HEADER_IMAGE_TEXT: Millions of movies, TV shows and people to discover. Explore now.
MODAL_SIGN_IN_DESC1: If you have not created an account yet, feel free to do so.
MODAL_SIGN_IN_DESC2: As a member of filmatory, we offer different perks
MODAL_SIGN_UP_DESC1: Your password must be 8 - 20 characters long
MODAL_SIGN_UP_DESC3: Your password must be atleast 1 number
MODAL_SIGN_UP_DESC4: Your password must be atleast 1 uppercase and 1 lowercase letter
MODAL_FORGOT_PASSWORD_DESC: Enter your email address and you will receive an email with a link, this link is only valid for 60 minutes
UPCOMING_NO_MORE_MOVIES_BUTTON: No more movies, click to go to top.
DASHBOARD_CHANGE_PASSWORD_LIST_ONE: Change your password, make sure its:
DASHBOARD_CHANGE_PASSWORD_LIST_FOUR: - Atleast 1 uppercase letter and 1 lowercase letter
DASHBOARD_FAVORITES_DESC: Add a movie or tv-show to your favorites and it will be shown here!
DASHBOARD_WATCHLIST_DESC: Add a movie or tv-show to your watchlist and you can view them here!
DASHBOARD_PROFILE_INFO_DESC: Create a username here, minimum 4 characters
DASHBOARD_PROFILE_INFO_UPLOAD_TEXT: Upload profile picture by clicking the button below
REVIEW_LOG_IN_TO_POST: Log in to post a review!
REVIEW_PENDING: You already have a pending review waiting for approval!
HOMEPAGE_CARD_DESC: With a membership you will be able to rate movies and make your own lists. Signing up is easy, free and fun.
ABOUT_CARD_ONE_TEXT: The group was founded in 2020 with a goal of making movie-watching more social. The website was launched in 2021 while Filmatory was still under development. Today weâ€™re fully functional and with more changes coming we hope to be the most popular place for information about media entertainment.  We welcome you to join and share with your friends.
ABOUT_CARD_TWO_TEXT: This website uses API's from TMDI to gather information about any tv-show, movie and actor. It uses MongoDB as the database, node.js for the web server the frontend is built using pug and UiKit
ADMIN_DASHBOARD_LANGUAGE_ADD_DESC_ONE: Name of the language translated(e.g. if you are translating swedish, the original name is Svenska)
ADMIN_DASHBOARD_LANGUAGE_ADD_DESC_TWO: Name of the language in english(e.g. if you are translating swedish, the name is swedish)
ADMIN_DASHBOARD_LANGUAGE_ADD_DESC_THREE: Language code of the language(e.g. if you are translating swedish, the code is se)
ADMIN_DASHBOARD_LANGUAGE_DELETE_DESC_ONE: Type the language you wish to delete
MEDIA_TOOLTIP_FAVORITES: Log in to add this to your favorites
MEDIA_TOOLTIP_WATCHLIST: Log in to add this to your watchlist
MEDIA_TOOLTIP_LIST: Log in to add this to your list
RESET_PASSWORD_ERROR_DESC_ONE: There was an error resetting your password, please try again.
RESET_PASSWORD_ERROR_DESC_TWO: If this error keeps recurring, please
RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS_DESC_ONE: You have successfully changed your password
RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS_DESC_TWO: Click here to go to the frontpage.
SUCCESS_FORGOTTEN_PASSWORD: Instructions has been sent to your e-mail address.
ERROR_USER_IS_BANNED: This user has been banned, contact support
ERROR_MISSING_INPUT: All input fields must be filled!
ERROR_SIGNUP_UNEXPECTED_ERROR: Unexpected error when creating user, try again
ERROR_RESET_PASSWORD_LINK: There was an error creating your resetlink, please try again
ERROR_EXPIRED_TOKEN: Token has expired or is incorrect
ERROR_USER_TOKEN_DOESNT_EXIST: User with this token doesn't exist
SUCCESS_PASSWORD_CHANGE: Password has successfully been changed, you will be redirected...
SUCCESS_PASSWORD_CHANGE_DASHBOARD: The password has been changed, the page is updated automatically ...
ERROR_DASHBOARD_UNEXPECTED_ERROR: Something went wrong, try again later
ERROR_COULD_NOT_CHANGE_USERNAME: Could not change the username, make sure its atleast 4 characters long
SUCCESS_USERNAME_CHANGE_DASHBOARD: Successfully changed the username, the page is being updated automatically...
ERROR_SAVING_AVATAR: Error when saving image to user
SUCCESS_AVATAR_UPLOAD: Successfully changed the avatar, the page is being updated automatically...
ERROR_LANGUAGE_CHARACTER_LIMIT: Language code has to be 2 letters
ERROR_LANGCODE_LETTERS: Language code has to be letters
ERROR_LANGUAGE_LETTERS: Language name has to be letters
SUCCESS_LANGUAGE_ADDED: Successfully added a new language, the page is being updated automatically...
SUCCESS_LANGUAGE_DELETED: Successfully deleted the language, the page is being updated automatically...
